alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 8:20PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO...WAYNE...AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A heavy lake effect snow band will continue to move south across Wayne, northern Cayuga, and Oswego counties through mid evening. The band of snow is now accelerating southward, and will produce a quick burst of heavy snow with 2 to 3 inch per hour snowfall rates. Travel conditions will rapidly deteriorate south of where heavy snow fell earlier today. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...The band of heavy lake effect snow will continue to move south through mid evening. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Ontario, Williamson, Marion, Clyde, Central Square, Sodus, Cato, Brewerton, Hastings, Walworth, Volney, Constantia, West Monroe, Palermo and Sterling. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 33. SAFETY INFO...Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy lake effect snow. If you must travel, be prepared for rapidly deteriorating driving conditions with very poor visibility and snow covered roads. &&
